name: Antons 10 Minutes in Cool Hell
description:
Uh oh, Anton fell into Cool Hell Park and now has to survive for 10 minutes in order to escape or something.

Throw hammers and explode the locals to get their cash to level up so you can get even more ways of destroying things.

Use 3 randomized equipment per run to cause extra damage.

Modify your run with unlockable modifiers that can change your run.

Game made in 2 months for the AntonJam3 & Blast jam

Music by @Panic1195AM

sound fx: Wario Land Series, Anton Blast, Random Youtube Videos

everything else: @cablll (me :3)
